places.name: Community Cafe
places.description: A cozy neighborhood cafe with comfortable seating, local art on the walls, and the aroma of fresh coffee. The perfect place for conversations and community gatherings.

places.name: Main Street
places.description: A quiet residential street lined with trees and small apartment buildings. The cafe sits at the corner, and the community garden is visible down the block.

places.name: Isabella's Apartment
places.description: A warm and inviting apartment above the cafe, decorated with plants and colorful artwork. The kitchen always smells like something delicious is cooking.

places.name: John's Apartment
places.description: A minimalist apartment with a dedicated workspace featuring dual monitors and design sketches on the walls. Large windows provide excellent natural light.

places.name: Maria's Apartment
places.description: A cozy apartment filled with books, plants, and photos from years of teaching. The balcony overlooks the community garden.

places.name: Community Garden
places.description: A shared garden space where residents grow vegetables, herbs, and flowers. There are benches for sitting and paths for walking between the plots.

places.name: Town Square
places.description: A small public square with a fountain in the center, surrounded by benches and shade trees. Often used for community events and gatherings.

objects.name: Professional Espresso Machine
objects.description: A gleaming stainless steel espresso machine that's the heart of the cafe

objects.name: Bakery Oven
objects.description: A professional oven used for baking pastries and bread

objects.name: Shared Garden Tools
objects.description: A collection of shovels, hoes, watering cans, and other gardening tools

objects.name: Town Square Fountain
objects.description: An ornate fountain with clear water and comfortable seating around the edge

objects.name: Community Message Board
objects.description: A cork board where residents post announcements, events, and messages
